name: Static Cling (Team Bugulon)
description:
Play as a rogue spark restrained to electronic devices, running, climbing and stretching through 3 worlds of unique puzzles. Can you free yourself of your electric tethers and escape?

Features:

  • 21 Levels of unique puzzle solving! 
  • A variety of mechanics and controllable objects
  • An original soundtrack
  • High quality pixel art graphics

Controls:

  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Extend
  • WASD - Move 
  • Space - Jump

Contributors: 

  • sarn - Programming
  • Oroshibu - Level Editor
  • squp - Level Design
  • Shrombus - Level Design
  • THX - Art
  • Snakeblock - Art
  • orisghost - Art
  • NotYourSagittarius - Art
  • Bub - Concept Art
  • Mista Jub - Sound and Music

Game design by everyone involved. 

The OST can be found here. 

Static Cling is a puzzle-platformer made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together".
